Description: This is the main page of the website, providing navigation and access to various sections and features.
This page allows users to browse products by different categories, facilitating easier shopping.
This page showcases special or unique shops, offering curated collections or specific themes.
Users can access and manage their account details, settings, and preferences on this page.
This page displays the user's recent purchases, providing order details and tracking information.
Users can find contact information and links to social media platforms to connect with the website or company.
